Terms of Service

Last updated: January 01, 2024

Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using the Pet Tracker application ("Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service.

These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and the Pet Tracker service. Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated by reference into these Terms.

Description of Service

Pet Tracker is a web-based application that provides pet tracking and management services using NFC (Near Field Communication) technology. Our Service includes:

  • NFC tag registration and management
  • Pet information storage and retrieval
  • Location tracking and geofencing capabilities
  • Medical record management
  • Emergency alert and contact systems
  • Integration with GitHub for data storage and issue tracking
  • Optional Patreon authentication for enhanced features

The Service is provided on an "as-is" basis and we reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the Service at any time.

User Accounts and Registration

Account Creation

To use certain features of our Service, you may need to register an account through Patreon OAuth or connect an NFC tag. When creating an account, you must:

  • Provide accurate and complete information
  • Keep your login credentials secure
  • Promptly update any changes to your information
  • Be responsible for all activities under your account

NFC Tag Registration

NFC tags must be legitimately purchased and owned by you. You may not:

  • Register tags that belong to others without permission
  • Use the Service for fraudulent or misleading purposes
  • Interfere with other users' tags or data

Account Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms. You may delete your account at any time, which will remove your data from our systems.

Acceptable Use Policy

You agree to use our Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You must not:

Prohibited Activities

  • Use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
  • Violate any applicable laws or regulations
  • Infringe upon the rights of others
  • Transmit any harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
  • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
  • Interfere with the proper functioning of the Service
  • Use automated systems to access the Service without permission
  • Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code

Content Guidelines

  • Provide accurate information about your pets
  • Respect the privacy of others
  • Do not upload inappropriate or copyrighted content
  • Keep medical information up-to-date and accurate

Emergency Services

  • Our Service is not a substitute for professional emergency services
  • In case of true emergencies, contact local emergency services immediately
  • Do not rely solely on our Service for critical emergency situations

Data and Privacy

Your Data

You retain ownership of all data you provide to our Service, including pet information, medical records, and location data. By using our Service, you grant us a limited license to:

  • Store and process your data to provide the Service
  • Use anonymized, aggregated data for service improvement
  • Share data as outlined in our Privacy Policy

Data Accuracy

You are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of all information you provide, especially:

  • Contact information for emergencies
  • Medical information and allergies
  • Pet identification details
  • Location and address information

Data Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data, but cannot guarantee absolute security. You acknowledge that:

  • No system is completely secure
  • You use the Service at your own risk
  • You should maintain backups of important information

Service Availability and Limitations

Service Uptime

While we strive to maintain high availability, we do not guarantee uninterrupted service. The Service may be unavailable due to:

  • Maintenance and updates
  • Technical issues or outages
  • Third-party service dependencies (GitHub, MongoDB, etc.)
  • Internet connectivity issues

Location Services

Location tracking depends on:

  • Device GPS capabilities and permissions
  • Network connectivity
  • Browser location API support
  • User-initiated location updates

We cannot guarantee location accuracy and recommend using multiple tracking methods for important situations.

NFC Technology

NFC functionality requires:

  • Compatible devices with NFC capabilities
  • Proper NFC tag programming and placement
  • Browser support for NFC APIs

Third-Party Services

Our Service integrates with various third-party services. Your use of these services is subject to their respective terms and policies:

GitHub

  • Used for data storage and issue tracking
  • Subject to GitHub's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
  • Required for core Service functionality

Patreon

  • Optional authentication and premium features
  • Subject to Patreon's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
  • Membership benefits may change based on Patreon policies

MongoDB

  • Used for scalable data storage
  • Subject to MongoDB's terms and privacy policies
  • Provides data synchronization capabilities

We are not responsible for the practices or policies of these third-party services, though we choose partners that maintain high standards of security and privacy.

Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Pet Tracker and its operators shall not be liable for:

Direct Damages

Indirect Damages

  • Consequential or incidental damages
  • Loss of business or profits
  • Emotional distress
  • Third-party claims or actions

Service Limitations

Our Service is designed to assist in pet tracking and management but is not a guarantee of pet safety or recovery. Users should:

  • Use multiple safety measures for pet protection
  • Maintain current identification and registration
  • Contact appropriate authorities in emergency situations
  • Keep backup records of important pet information

In jurisdictions that do not allow limitation of liability, our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

  • Your use of the Service

This indemnification obligation will survive termination of your use of the Service.
